price: (Nuuhiin) ni jedhe: "Gooftaa kiyya! Ani ummata kiyya halkaniifi guyyaan waame.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
